promptVersions.body:
Easily review and approve leave requests from your team—all in one place!


• Use filters to find requests by employee, status, or leave type  

• See approved leaves on the team calendar  

• Access full approval history for every request

How to Manage Team Leaves
promptVersions.description: Prompt for managers announcing the new ability to escalate leave requests to a senior manager (N+2) and automatically synchronize approval tasks. Guides managers to use the new escalation and approval sync feature.
promptVersions.imageAltText: Screenshot of the manager dashboard showing team leave requests and calendar
promptVersions.title: Approve Requests and Track Your Team
